title: FS/FT: T207 Lot with Many HOF's and SP's  **FINAL PRICE DROP**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS/FT: T207 Lot with Many HOF's and SP's  **FINAL PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
I have available the following lot of T207 cards.  As anybody who has attempted it can attest, this is an extremely challenging set with at least 70-80 tough cards and some that hardly ever come up for sale.  Very underrated in value also, as all of these cards are far scarcer than the more widely collected T205 and T206 sets.

I am pricing these cards individually based on condition and relative scarcity.  All prices are delivered.  Payment via any method you prefer.   I would also consider trades for cards I need from other sets.  Thanks for looking and please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or to reserve cards.


Cards Pictured (removing **SOLD** cards for easier viewing):


Raw Cards-

Covington $12
Danforth $18
Devlin $12
Ferry $9
Knabe $8
B. Lord $8
McLean $12
J. Miller $30
Mullin (no "D" on cap) $45
Snodgrass $18


Graded Cards-

Carey (PSA 1) HOF $60
Downey (SGC A) one of the toughest cards in the set, even more so with Anonymous back $250
Doyle (SGC 10) $17
Marquard (SGC 20) HOF $50
Lennox, Mcintire and Reulbach.  Thanks, Eric
Bump for a price drop on all cards.  Thanks!
Bescher arrived today. Thank you for the incredibly fast shipping.
Last bump for a final price drop on all cards before I send 'em to eBay.  Thanks!
